title: Innovations in electrocatalysts, hybrid anodic oxidation, and electrolyzers for enhanced direct seawater electrolysis
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6897-6942
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01693A, Review Article
Dong Liu, Yaohai Cai, Xin Wang, Yuling Zhuo, Xulei Sui, Hui Pan, Zhenbo Wang
This review focuses on the latest developments in direct seawater electrolysis, specifically in electrocatalysts, hybrid anodic oxidation, and electrolyzers, providing a glimpse into the future of environmentally friendly hydrogen generation.
